Volvo VADIS (Volvo Aftersales Diagnostic Information System)

IT COVERS THE FOLLOWING MODELS FROM 1975-2005:
XC90 (2003-2005)
V7XC/XC70 (2001-2005)
V70XC (1998-2000)
V90 (1997-1998)
V70 (1997-2005)
V50 (2004-2005)
V40 (1996-2004)
S90 (1997-1998)
S80 (1999-2005)
S70 (1997-2000)
S60 (2001-2005)
S40 (1994-2005)
C70 Coupe (1998-2002)
C70 Convertible (1998-2005)
960 (1991-1997)
940 (1991-1998)
850 (1992-1997)
780 (1986-1991)
760 (1982-1990)
740(1984-1992)
480 (1986-1995)
460 (1989-1997)
440 (1989-1997)
360 (1985-1989)
340 (1985-1991)
260 (1975-1985)
240 (1975-1993)
